attributes.action: Outlaw All Abuse of the Elderly, Sick and Disabled through Lack of Food or Heating!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That all Elderly, In-firmed and Disabled People be given the right in "Law" to access Free Heating and subsidised Food for all on "Benefits"and "Pensions" during the "Winter" months and all "Cold" spells of weather.Futher, laws to protect same if person or person's, family, public or public services are found wanting.
